gui.text

Class Text

  • java.lang.Object
    • gui.text.Text
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AsciiTypable, FunctionTypable, Typable

    public class Text
extends java.lang.Object
implements Typable
    A class to aid in handling and displaying text.
